description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fighting game with avatars... now with online multiplayer!  Fight to become champion of the Avatar Fighter tournament!  Choose out of eight characters, or use your own avatar as a custom fighter with a customizable move set!
description.short: A fighting game with avatars... now with online multiplayer!  Fight to become champion of the Avatar Fighter tournament!  Choose out of eight characters, or use your own avatar as a custom fighter with a customizable move set!
